Havotron turned.  "Welcome to Earth." he said aloud to himself.  "Future 
Empire of the Decepticon cause."

He looked around for some one to give an important job.  "Scrapper.  I 
want to make radio contact with the Decepticons here on Earth.  Schedule 
a meeting and a place where i will take my place as new leader of the 
DEcepticons."

Scrapper turned and smiled.  Nightmare seemed to do all the work for 
him, and he would rather play with a radio then lifting bodies.

He walked to the transmitter and sat down.  "Attention Decepticons of 
Earth precint.  This is Scrapper of the Decepticons for Earths 
Domination. My leader, Havotron, has been sent to take over control of 
all Decepticons.  Your mission to sieze control of Earth has taken to 
long so you must give in to us and your new commander Havotron.  Your 
current commander, must meet with Havotron as soon as possible. Do you 
copy?"

Quake turned to Apeface.  "No, how bout we walk because that would be 
fast.  Geez.  Quake turned and jump up transforming into his jet mode 
and shooting straight up through the mountains tunnel created by the 
ships impact and out into the open air.

rdahl@... wrote:

> Nightmare nodded, smoke hazing above his head as he did it. He walked
> over to the rubble, and put down Jagged very gently. He then moved
> Needlenose out of the way, and began to swat pieces of ruble out of the
> way, clearing Spinister. He hoisted Spinister over his shoulder, then
> grabbed Jagged and Needlenose, and lifted them off the ground by their
> arms, then headed back to the CR chambers. He placed each once in
> carefully, then entered one of his own, and set it on the same setting
> as Jaggeds, replication of Alien lifeform.
> 
> Apeface trudged over to the hole in the side of the ship, as Spasma rode
> on his back. "We take to the air?" He asked Quake.
